dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice [Notice ID: 8760030]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 07, 2005 1:52 PM
To: paramount@copyright-compliance.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice [Notice ID: 8760030]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

pccc> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
pccc> Hash: SHA1

pccc> ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
pccc> 1333 Stemmons Frwy - Suite 110





pccc> Notice ID:8760030
pccc> Notice  Date:7 Jan 2005 17:38:53 GMT

pccc> Dear Sir or Madam:

pccc> BayTSP, Inc. ("BayTSP") swears under penalty of perjury
pccc> that Paramount Pictures Corporation ("Paramount") has authorized
pccc> BayTSP to act as its non-exclusive agent for copyright
pccc> infringement notification. BayTSP's search of the protocol
pccc> listed below has detected infringements of Paramount's copyright
pccc> interests on your IP addresses as detailed in the attached
pccc> report.

pccc> BayTSP has reasonable good faith belief that use of the
pccc> material in the manner complained of in the attached report is
pccc> not authorized by Paramount, its agents, or the law. The
pccc> information provided herein is accurate to the best of our
pccc> knowledge. Therefore, this letter is an official notification to
pccc> effect removal of the detected infringement listed in the
pccc> attached report. The attached documentation specifies the exact
pccc> location of the infringement.

pccc> We hereby request that you immediately remove or block
pccc> access to the infringing material, as specified in the copyright
pccc> laws, and insure the user refrains from using or sharing with
pccc> others Paramount's materials in the future (see, 17 U.S.C.
